page.title: 08THE ROYAL HIGHLAND SHOW
page.content: The Highland Show is a big attraction every year. The Highland Society has been formed for 201 years and there have been 146 Highland Shows since. The Highland Show was formed to promote the interests of Scottish agricultural and allied industries. They employ 35 full time staff. It takes 15 months to prepare for the Highland Show.The purpose of the show is to bring together farmers and the firms supplying farmers also to promote better understanding between farmers and the rest of the poupulation. There are 17,351 members of the Highland Society. There are 19 different breeds of Cattle. There are 17 different breeds of sheep.
